allow: Bash(__NEW_LINE_6d586e19b9d0f869__ curl -s -X POST "https://api.supabase.com/v1/projects/$PROJECT_ID/database/query" -H "Authorization: Bearer $ACCESS_TOKEN" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{""query"": ""SELECT policyname, cmd, qual, roles FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename = ''''creators'''' ORDER BY policyname;""}')
